data.name: statement
data.value: SELECT CONCAT(QUOTENAME(schema_name(tab1.schema_id)), '.', QUOTENAME(tab1.name)) AS [table], col1.name AS [column], CONCAT(QUOTENAME(schema_name(tab2.schema_id)), '.', QUOTENAME(tab2.name)) AS [referenced_table], col2.name AS [referenced_column] FROM sys.foreign_key_columns fkc INNER JOIN sys.foreign_keys fk ON fkc.constraint_object_id = fk.object_id INNER JOIN sys.tables tab1 ON tab1.object_id = fkc.parent_object_id INNER JOIN sys.columns col1 ON col1.column_id = fkc.parent_column_id AND col1.object_id = tab1.object_id INNER JOIN sys.tables tab2 ON tab2.object_id = fkc.referenced_object_id INNER JOIN sys.columns col2 ON col2.column_id = fkc.referenced_column_id AND col2.object_id = tab2.object_id WHERE fk.is_disabled = 0 AND CONCAT(QUOTENAME(schema_name (tab1.schema_id)) , '.' , QUOTENAME(tab1.name)) IN ('[dbo].[_TransactionIndex_31adb587-a9ae-4f15-839b-1bb9ac305049]','[dbo].[EmployeeHoliday]','[dbo].[EmployeeSalary]','[dbo].[pivottable]','[DIM].[CANCELLATION_CODE]','[DIM].[CARRIERS]','[DIM].[DATE]','[DIM].[EMPLOYEES]','[DIM].[LOCATION]','[DIM].[plane]','[STA].[AIRPORTS]','[STA].[CARRIERS]','[STA].[FLIGHTDATA]','[STA].[PLANEDATA]','[TMP].[AIRPORTS]','[TMP].[CARRIERS]','[TMP].[FLIGHTDATA]','[TMP].[LOADINGFAILURES]','[TMP].[PLANEDATA]')

action.name: sql_text
action.value: SELECT CONCAT(QUOTENAME(schema_name(tab1.schema_id)), '.', QUOTENAME(tab1.name)) AS [table], col1.name AS [column], CONCAT(QUOTENAME(schema_name(tab2.schema_id)), '.', QUOTENAME(tab2.name)) AS [referenced_table], col2.name AS [referenced_column] FROM sys.foreign_key_columns fkc INNER JOIN sys.foreign_keys fk ON fkc.constraint_object_id = fk.object_id INNER JOIN sys.tables tab1 ON tab1.object_id = fkc.parent_object_id INNER JOIN sys.columns col1 ON col1.column_id = fkc.parent_column_id AND col1.object_id = tab1.object_id INNER JOIN sys.tables tab2 ON tab2.object_id = fkc.referenced_object_id INNER JOIN sys.columns col2 ON col2.column_id = fkc.referenced_column_id AND col2.object_id = tab2.object_id WHERE fk.is_disabled = 0 AND CONCAT(QUOTENAME(schema_name (tab1.schema_id)) , '.' , QUOTENAME(tab1.name)) IN ('[dbo].[_TransactionIndex_31adb587-a9ae-4f15-839b-1bb9ac305049]','[dbo].[EmployeeHoliday]','[dbo].[EmployeeSalary]','[dbo].[pivottable]','[DIM].[CANCELLATION_CODE]','[DIM].[CARRIERS]','[DIM].[DATE]','[DIM].[EMPLOYEES]','[DIM].[LOCATION]','[DIM].[plane]','[STA].[AIRPORTS]','[STA].[CARRIERS]','[STA].[FLIGHTDATA]','[STA].[PLANEDATA]','[TMP].[AIRPORTS]','[TMP].[CARRIERS]','[TMP].[FLIGHTDATA]','[TMP].[LOADINGFAILURES]','[TMP].[PLANEDATA]')
